1.title: The Intervention

episode of.title: Write Like the Wind & Never Stop Thinking: The Making of Bad Goddess (TV Series 2018– )

1.plot: The Nekomi Gang attempt an intervention on Keiichi that backfires when Belldandy gives him a night of sex so intense, he suffers a heart attack. Urd, Skuld, and Marller set out to an Anime Convention to raise the money for his operation.

2.title: The Allegory

episode of.title: Write Like the Wind & Never Stop Thinking: The Making of Bad Goddess (TV Series 2018– )

2.plot: Kevin attempts to explain the Allegory of Bad Goddess and how it relates to his life. As an added bonus, the centerpiece is a Director's Cut Remix of The Bad Goddess Who Fell to Earth as it was originally intended in the Fan Fiction series.

3.title: The Re-Arrangement

episode of.title: Write Like the Wind & Never Stop Thinking: The Making of Bad Goddess (TV Series 2018– )

3.plot: Kevin portrays Bad Goddess as it might have been if he had skipped over Season Two: The Pilot in favor of a Season that more closely resembles the Fan Fiction series.

imdb.title: Write Like the Wind & Never Stop Thinking: The Making of Bad Goddess
akas: Write Like the Wind & Never Stop Thinking: The Making of Bad Goddess (United States)
plot: Shortly after watching Silent Night, Deadly Night Part 2, a film infamously known as an exploitation hack job, Kevin gets the idea to exploit Bad Goddess by re-editing it's episodes into feature length films with documentary introductions.::Kevin from the Other Dimension
